content: tiny crocheted bunny free pattern by nansyoops legend  chain chain  single_crochet single_crochet  increase increase s work two single_crochet in one stitch  decrease decrease 2 of the following single_crochet make together  slip_stitch slip_stitch materials and tools yarn iris by gamma cream hook 0 75 sintepon thread pink black needles scissors a head & body to crochet together 1 6 single_crochet into a magic_ring 2 6 increase 12 3 single_crochet increase * 6 times 18 4 2sc increase * 6 times 24 5 3sc increase * 6 times 30 6 30 single_crochet 7 30 single_crochet 8 3sc decrease * 6 times 24 9 2sc decrease * 6 times 18 10 single_crochet decrease * 6 times 12 11 2sc decrease * 3 times 9 starting the body stuff the head tightly crochet 9 single_crochet 9 13 2sc increase * 3 times 12 14 12 single_crochet 15 single_crochet increase * 6 times 18 16 18 single_crochet 17 2sc increase * 6 times 24 18 24 single_crochet 19 2sc decrease * 6 times 18 20 single_crochet decrease * 6 times 12 21 6 decrease stuff fasten_off arms 1 6 single_crochet into a magic_ring 2 6 rounds of 6 single_crochet legs 1 4 chain starting with the second one from the hook do increase then single_crochet in the next loop 3 single_crochet and in the remaining 2 loops 1 single_crochet each 8 single_crochet 2 2 increase 2 single_crochet 2 times 12 3 12 single_crochet 4 12 single_crochet 5 3 single_crochet 4 decrease single_crochet 8 6 8 single_crochet to stuff the foot 7 8 single_crochet 8 work 4 decrease ears 9 chain in second loop from the hook do slip stich then - single_crochet 2 double_crochet 2 triple chrochet double_crochet single_crochet now without breaking the tread crochet 10 chain and repeat all stitches as in the first ear 1ch is needed for a space between the ears but you can crochet ears separately i also crocheted in darker colour 2 chains from 6 chain and stitched them into the ears embroid eyes and nose attach all parts to the right places and you are done i m on facebook www facebook com/nansyoops instagram @nansyoops
